Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: Oona
Reviews.Content: To start, I like the phone:  this is the first phone I have had to text with and I really like the key pad, despite it being an older model and thicker than the latest ones.  I bought my phone new via Beast Deals, but when I took it to Verizon to activated it, the Sales Associate there informed me the phone was not new and even called Customer Service to prove it.  My "new" phone was activated in April 2008 and deactivated from an account Sept. 2008.  On a side note the Verizon Sales Associate was extremely rude and "made fun" of my phone in front of me.  I was irritated that she had to prove to me the phone was used instead of just doing her job and activating it.  Anyway, I went to Amazon with my info of my "new" phone being used and they didn't question it at all and simply refunded me the difference between new and used price.  I don't order much through Amazon and I was disappointed to discover new items being sold as used, but Amazon did make it right by me, so please beware that just because you purchase an item as new, doesn't mean it really is.

Reviews.Title: not so good
Reviews.Author: lg
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for 3 months and am NOT satisfied. It has difficulty charging, you have to keep moving the plug where it goes into the phone to get it to charge.  The keys stick and you cannot text because they stick.  The camera button stopped working, so now i CAN NOT TAKE A PICTURE.  This phone is terrible, it cost $70 and was supposed to be new but i think they sold me a used or old phone. I emailed them saying it was terrible but got nothing back.

Reviews.Title: Adequate Quality-Just what we expected.
Reviews.Author: cheryl
Reviews.Content: Good 2ndary phone for our nephew. It works and the voice and texts are clear. Happy with purchase, will do business again.

Reviews.Title: I will continue to buy from you
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I am going to be short and simple here:The phone came fast and as described.The phone would not charge at no fault to the seller becaus eit was a brand new phone.They shipped a new battery to me for free with a car charger.The phone still would not charge with the new battery.They shipped a new phone to me.The new phone also just as described worked.I was refunded my all my expenses due to the faulty phone which again was not their fault.I will be back when I need a replacement phone.

Reviews.Title: Silver Qwerty LG cell phone
Reviews.Author: Not Happy
Reviews.Content: I am not happy with this product. Right after the 30 day warrenty the cell phone screen blacked out.Unable to return item.  Was sold as new, the items was clearly used product. Ok button sticked when I received it decided to keep it. BAD choice, should have returned it right away.  Buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: Defective..
Reviews.Author: Ravenhair
Reviews.Content: The phone never charged properly, was pretty beat up.  We got a new charger, no improvement.  Verizon said the phone was defective.  It was a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: kristina schmahl
Reviews.Content: If you are not addicted to the newer smartphones, this is a good product. I like the keyboard layout it offers.

Reviews.Title: Will it work?
Reviews.Author: Dylan Richard
Reviews.Content: Was shipped to me unable of being programmed. Sure it looks pretty in my closet but I would have loved to use it.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Moore
Reviews.Content: I had one of these cell phones that had several years of use on it before it died. I decided to replace it with the same model so I could keep using the chargers, extra batteries, etc that I already had. Have been using it a few months with no problems. Only minor thing is the black paint is flaking off the front plastic parts, doesn't affect the operation of the phone.

Reviews.Title: Old fashioned
Reviews.Author: Ranchito4ever "Ranchito4ever"
Reviews.Content: Low memory space, could not hold many text messages.  Keypad lighting broke after two days of activation.  Horrible phone to rely on!  Phone was supposed to be new, but received an used one! Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Okay phone
Reviews.Author: Wanderer
Reviews.Content: It's an old phone - not really special, not as sturdy as flip phones, and the outside buttons in my opinion do not click very well.

Reviews.Title: Overall
Reviews.Author: Lisa Tapia
Reviews.Content: We bought this phone for my mother to replace her old one.  The phone for the most part meets expectations but she has a hard time getting the ringer volumn up loud enough to hear.

Reviews.Title: Apprehensive after reading reviews.
Reviews.Author: sk&co
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time, packaged well. No problems with Verizon. I am very happy with this purchase. Great price. Charger & car charger included! They even followed up to make sure I am happy.

Reviews.Title: Silver LG VX99000 ENV QWERTY Camera Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Hamiltion Nevis
Reviews.Content: I choose this phone because I previously owned an LG and was pleased with its performance.  This phone suites my current needs well and I satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: works, but not for long
Reviews.Author: bb
Reviews.Content: This product disappointed me. It's great if all you're doing is texting, but it dies about 10 minutes into a phone call and you can only make about one call per day. I went through a couple chargers before I accepted that the battery is just no good. I would not buy from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: great fill in phone
Reviews.Author: Russy's mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take the place of my "new one" from Verizon that I hated and it is good deal for the money

Reviews.Title: Used !! Do not buy !!!
Reviews.Author: mona mckay
Reviews.Content: I just had this phone that I paid good money for activated and found out that it was used.. As I am talking on it all it does is beep every few seconds like there is a message someone left on there alerting me and there is no way to stop it.. It is very annoying as your trying to speak and hear the other person..I am very dissatisfied and they won't take it back or exchange it because I waited to long to activate it. ! Do not buy from this web !

Reviews.Title: it was a short lived replacement
Reviews.Author: michael franz
Reviews.Content: Dropped my phone in the toilet and did not have the money for a true replacement  pros it was useful at the time cons it was very ut of date  none of the apps worked

Reviews.Title: Not as ordered
Reviews.Author: anita manning
Reviews.Content: IT was presented as a new phone, but was reconditioned and I was unable to activate it as it was invalid.

Reviews.Title: the phone did not work
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: this phone worked for about a week, it would not ring or dial out. i took it to verizon and they said it was a defect in the fone. i contacted the company were i ordered it from and they did nothing.  this sale sucked!! lost over 40bucks. i was told they would text it but i hade to pay for shipping both ways.. ended up getting my daughter a Iphone from verizon.yea 2 year contract. errr

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY PHONES FROM THIS SELLER!
Reviews.Author: SAC
Reviews.Content: I REPEAT.... DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE FROM THIS SELLER. The phone had none of the updates nessasary for downloading ringtones and games. The battery has the life of a fly. Recently the phone began slilently turning itself off if it was put in (or taken out of) a pocket or if you accidently pushed any button while putting it in (or taking it out of) the cellphone holder. Come to think of it.... I would not buy any phone from this seller because they probably will not have the nessary updates to work properly either!

Reviews.Title: Avoid This Phone
Reviews.Author: J.L. Populist
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone new and used it for five months.It's a slider with a keyboard.The Pros:Good reception and signal strength even in a remote area.Layout is convenient and easy to use.The keyboard is just big enough to work well for me.The size is right. Not too small or too large.The Con is a big one and a deal-breaker in my opinion.This model is becoming known for it's cheap charging port. In my case it will no longer charge.After talking to some friends I have found that others who used this phone had the same issue.This is worse than the charging problem with the old Motorola e815's. At least the wall chargers would wear out rather than the charging port on that phone. And the wall chargers were dirt cheap. No such easy fix for the LG EnV.I would definitely not recommend this phone!

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: disappointed college student
Reviews.Content: This phone came with a button missing, scratches and not all the buttons work. You have to hit them hard in order for them to show up on the screen. All of the persons contacts still in the phone and a password is needed to delete them. I could have used the money to buy a better phone at the verizon store. When I emailed them to see if I could return it they did not answer my email and therefore I am posting this. Not happy at all.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived safely and just as described. My granddaughter is very happy with her phone. It also arrived on time and boxed. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: battery loose
Reviews.Author: emily
Reviews.Content: This was sold to me in terrible condition. The battery does not even stay in place. It connects, but, the top part of the battery flops in and out of the phone. 40 bucks wasted

Reviews.Title: Silvver LG VX9900 ENV Verizon Phone
Reviews.Author: Hilda M. Roybal "Doll Costumer"
Reviews.Content: Phone was a little more scratch then expected, but worked just fine. Arrive in a timely matter, as inform. Happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: The phone is working perfectly,The condition is good, I would have liked to get the owners manual, but everything else was there and the phones works. I reviewed eralier that the camera was not working,but it is working so please delete the previous review.

Reviews.Title: bad phone or battery
Reviews.Author: bryant waters
Reviews.Content: The phone doesn't work well at all was suppose to be sent a battery and it never came very dissapointed...........

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: I got the product i wanted and it is working great for my needs. I am very satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: not as planned
Reviews.Author: happy camper
Reviews.Content: Phone worked good for 2 weeks then the died. It says fully charged but goes blank when unplugged. I had to replace. with another phone

Reviews.Title: Silver LG VX9900 ENV QWERTY Camera Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Righty 13
Reviews.Content: I Love the full keybord now it does not take me a lone time to texted my friends it is much easyer to texted them then the other way I did it.It is a little biger then the other phones that I had without a Contract.

Reviews.Title: I did not like this phone. At all.
Reviews.Author: Lalalala
Reviews.Content: When I got this phone, it worked great and there was nothing worng with the seller. But a few weeeks later, I was charging it and when I pulled the charger out the whole port thing came with it. It may have been my fault though. So I sent it back (30 day warrenty) and got a new one. Again, there was nothing wrong with it. Nothing wrong with the seller. But the phone was VERY bulky in my pocket, most of the time it would barley even fit in my pocket. And it always fell out. I lost it at school about 4 times but luckly, I got it back! I guess a peice of crap phone like this wasnt worth taking...(: But the description says that its hard to break, and I dropped it many times. The screws came loose, and it eventualy just fell apart. The keyboard stopped working, the screen did also. About one fourth of the screen went black, and then the rest did over time. The speaker was fuzzy and I just dont like the phone. If I were you, I'd go buy the Env 2 or 3, its worth it to spend the extra few dollars.

Reviews.Title: Sad phone buyer-won't charge
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Wouldn't charge...have to get a new phone. Not buying used anymore. Not sure if the product is bad or if seller didn't review the product out was sending out. Verizon said the charging port was broken.

Reviews.Title: lovely phone
Reviews.Author: Alexander beast mode
Reviews.Content: well over the summer at my grandfathers i did a lot of yard work and i needed a new phone he said what kind i said the one my cousin Ross has which is the vx9900 i like it a lot when he let me play games on it so i got it. LOVE IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Ok but pretty big
Reviews.Author: Ninjaboot
Reviews.Content: It's an ok phone but it is much bigger than any current phones. Otherwise works as advertised, have not had any issues with it.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Ordered this phone simply for the price.Definitley can say i got my moneys worth. The phone came brand new just like it said and was happy about that.Got the phone today and so far everything is working fine and am happy. Was worried after reading all the reviews about people getting phones in really crappy shape but nope mine came brand new. thumbs up for that . Will update if run into any problems so far nothing . ( hopefully stays that way.)

Reviews.Title: The sexy lg vx9900
Reviews.Author: Olusola the seller
Reviews.Content: This is the phone  my son  has been dreaming for, the samasug galexitys didn't fit my son and also the blackberry bold too, but he just wanted an basic phone, smartphones are cool and all but the Lg vx9900 env is almost the best phone he has ever layed eyes on. He is on the keyboard 90% of the time but the main screen is helpful for the ones who like to call. He likes this phone because 50% of his ringtones are from v-cast and the other 50% comes from a website called mediafiremp3.com. This phone is great for starters but this is his only basic phone out off 6 smartphones. It's body is very light, light as a pin. So don't start off with a smartphone cause trust me parents don't buy you another one unless they are rich like I am . Trust me get this phone. And  for a aau basketball travel team he text me when is nervous about a game. Also acceasing your own music is a piece of cake and sometimes you don't even have to use a data caple. The camera has an exellent view and I love when my son took a picture when he won the tournenment. Texting no problem easyest for people who text fast. Downloading games is a piece of cake also for other things. Trust me try it out and trust we won't let you down.

ProductInfo.Name: Silver LG VX9900 ENV QWERTY Camera Cell Phone for Verizon Wireless - No Contract required
